description: Designed for the Explorer, your ‚ÄúRound the World‚Äù food experience starts here. There's a world to discover in Toronto and we want to share this passion for international foods by sharing the flavours of the world with you. We are dedicated to the one thing that makes Toronto better than any other city in the world: Diversity. There are more languages spoken and more diverse ethnic groups living in Toronto than any city in the world. That makes Toronto the best city to taste your way around the planet with authentic and culturally relevant foods to discover. "Never in history could you taste the world with just a bus pass" Taste - Learn - Discover

reviews.title: Fabulous, filling and educational!
text: Jusep was fabulous! Amazing energy and super knowledgeable about the history of Kensington Market.  We felt so well taken care of as we toured the area.  The food selections were exceptional.  I would highly recommend, the best tour I have ever taken.

reviews.title: Kensington Market Food tour
text: Food stops were good.......Id switch out the poutine for Fish and chips.... Guide was ok, didn't seem engaged our experiences... when we talked about our experiences. Way too much personal history. But we did enjoy the day

reviews.title: Great Experience
text: This tour was well worth the time and money.  Jessica our host was very informed and made our tour fun.  Food was also great.  Definitely highlighted how diverse Kensington Market and Toronto are.

reviews.title: Good tour
text: Great tour with William.  He was very enthusiastic and informative.  It was a good walk around the area to the places that we ate at.  I would say the only change would be to eliminate the Golden Patty part of the tour - at least give a taste of something other than the beef patty in coco bread.  Wasn‚Äôt a fan, and I sensed others felt the same.   The portions overall were a lot more than I was expecting.. I would say I was closer to almost 1.5 meals worth of food... so come a little hungry.  Otherwise, this tour is highly recommended.

reviews.title: This food tour should not be missed!
text: Had a wonderful experience on this food tour! Food was amazing and included delicious fusions of flavours! Jusep was such a great guide‚Ä¶ thoroughly enjoyed hearing all the history of the neighborhood as well as his personal stories.
Highly recommend this tour! Do not miss!

reviews.title: Amazing!!
text: Jessica was amazing!!!! Loved heeeeeerüò≠‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞ she literally took her time with our group. We had an amazing combination of international cuisines, and it was such a fun and family friendly tour, 10 out of 10 would do again!!

reviews.title: Great food, great guides.
text: Jesep and Jessica are passionate about their city and passionate about Kensington Market. It was great spending some time getting to know this neighbourhood and sample so many amazing local dishes. Thank you for sharing your knowledge and so many historical tidbits about the market and the city.

reviews.title: Colorful Slice of Toronto
text: Very interesting and informative. Great way to see and experience a colorful part of the city. Jessica was a wonderful guide.

reviews.title: Experience multiple continents in 2 hours.
text: We took the Taste of the continents international food tour on a Sunday morning. We had a great time. Jessica took us around. She was very attentive and personable, she had lots of interesting facts about the history of the area and despite being a local, and having visited the market many times, she showed us areas we had never noticed. The food was very good, and filling. We started out with a smoked meat poutine, meat and cheese empanadas, Jamaican patties in coco bread, interesting sushi wrapped in a tofu pocket, Tibetan salty butter tea & dumplings and Swedish iced tea with ginger cookies.  I'd gladly recommend this as a good activity for anyone visiting the city, or locals who wanted to sample what different places offer, without committing to an entire serving of something you have never tried. It really showcases, the many ethnicities that make our city home.

reviews.title: Fun tasty tour and you'll be full
text: Enjoyed Jessica's tour of 6 Kensington spots. We had Qu√©b√©cois, Jamaican, Chilean, Japanese, Tibetan and Swedish. The sizes were not huge, not tiny, just right. We didn't eat dinner we were that full. Highly recommend for everyone, even Torontonians like us.
Glad I  found it here on TA. Very reasonabke price.

reviews.title: Excellent tour!
text: William was an excellent guide. The history of the city along with eclectic food tastings were excellent. We would recommend this tour!

reviews.title: Amazing experience
text: Great tour and the guide was very kind and attentive (thank you William!) and amazing food! A great experience and opportunity to try new foods.

reviews.title: Fantastic culinary experience in Toronto
text: Hi Willliam, I wanted to extend my heartfelt thanks for the incredible experience you provided during the Taste of the Continents: International Food Tour in Toronto yesterday. My 17-year-old son and I had an absolutely fantastic time exploring the diverse culinary delights the city has to offer.

Your knowledge of the different cuisines and the cultural insights you shared made the tour both educational and enjoyable. We appreciated your enthusiasm and the way you engaged with everyone in the group, making us feel welcome and included.

The selection of restaurants was excellent, and each stop offered something unique and delicious. It was clear that you put a lot of thought into curating the tour, and it truly enhanced our experience.
Thank you for making our day memorable. We will definitely recommend this tour to our friends and family!

reviews.title: Wonderful and Unique Experience
text: Jessica was an amazing tour guide!  She was fun and showed us so many restaurants that we might want to visit again.  The tasting was perfect - laid out so well with a variety of foods we hadn‚Äôt ever tried.  We can‚Äôt wait to do another tour like this in another big city!

reviews.title: Tour Won't Disappoint!
text: We had a fabulous time on our tour.  Food was delicious and the tour actually helped us discover the history of Toronto in a fun way.  The food is ready for you at the restaurants, no waiting, and then you walk around the neighborhood which is actually the perfect way to get a little exercise in and keep your appetite up for the next delicious serving!

reviews.title: Super Lunch With Our New Friend Jessica
text: Jessica was such a delight!  We had so much fun bonding with our small group and learning about this amazing neighborhood.  So glad we had a guide through this large and diverse area.  The food and the history were amazing.

reviews.title: Great way to try several food cultures.
text: My 12 year old grandson and I had a great time. Jessica is a great guide. Fun to learn about the local history as we enjoyed the food.

reviews.title: Highly recommend for quick sample of diverse foods! Jessica was a great tour guide!
text: Recommend to anyone wanting to try a diverse variety of foods! We had Jessica. She was amazing! Unfortunately, we were running late. We contacted TripAdvisor, and then Jessica directly. She saved food from the first couple stops and caught us up! We truly appreciated it! Thanks!

reviews.title: The International Food Tour and Guide Jessica are Great!
text: The Taste of the Continents: International Food Tour was great! Jessica was our guide and she hit the sweet spot of informative, creative, and fun with the tour. My wife and I had thought about exploring Kensington Market on our own, but a recommendation from my sister (who took the tour in 2023), convinced us to book this tour. There isn't really much to expand on the tour description, Jessica hit all that is described. The best thing I can say is we plan to book one of their other tours (Fusion Fare) on a future visit to Toronto.

reviews.title: Excellent tour
text: It was a GREAT tour! Our host Jessica was exceptional! She not only told us the history of the food but she was also so knowledgeable about the people, many years ago compared to now. Great host, great food and great experience!

reviews.title: Interesting and Delicious
text: William was an excellent host. He was careful to ensure that the group knew exactly what to expect. He attended to the needs of all of our group.
William provided an excellent background for each of the food samples.  He also provided interesting  histories on both the food and the Kensington neighborhood.
Overall it was a great experience with very tasty (and filling) food samples.

reviews.title: Very special activity!
text: Jusep's energy, extensive knowledge, and super friendly personality made this international food tour a fantastic experience. The funky and unique Kensington Market area is probably not one that we would have found on our own, but we relished being immersed in the culture there. We're longtime travelers, but we've never seen anything quite like it. The sampling of food and drink covered many continents, and the pace was leisurely and enjoyable. This activity will be one of our most memorable from our first trip to Toronto!

reviews.title: Fun and delicious!
text: This was one of the most fun and delicious food tours I have done.   Guissepe made the day tremendously enjoyable with lively anecdotes and wonderful food choices.  Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Outstanding Experience.
text: Jessica was such a breath of fresh air as she totally opened the neighborhood to our access and understanding. The food choices and people we meet were so bought into bringing Toronto to Kinsington. A neighborhood on the way back to a truly melting pit of America.

reviews.title: Small group, great time, awesome food!
text: Jessica was amazing! We loved her warm, friendly spirit and how knowledgeable she was about the history of Kensington and Toronto. The Jamaican patty and sushi were awesome!

reviews.title: A must do tour!!
text: Absolutely amazing tour!! The food was absolutely outstanding!! Definitely food I would have had a hard time finding myself. Jesep our guide is just an amazing human! Such a great and gracious host. Do this tour!!

reviews.title: Will take the tour again
text: This is the best food tour we have ever taken and we take at least one food tour every time we visit somewhere new.  (My husband and I are in our 70's and have traveled the world.)  Jessica was so welcoming, knowledgeable and so professional as our guide.  This tour was the only of this format that we have taken.  Instead of being in a market under a roof, we walked the neighborhood visiting small shops, grocery stores and eateries.  We would love to take this tour again with Jessica when we return to Toronto.

reviews.title: Best food your ever!
text: Jessica was amazing!!!! Best food tour ever. She was so kind and her stories were great! 10/10 would recommend and I‚Äôm from Toronto!

reviews.title: So fun, informative & delicious!!
text: Oh my gosh, so fun. We had several tastings, got lots of interesting information about the food and Kensington Market. Loved the vibe & food was great. And our tour guide, Jessica was amazing!!

reviews.title: Fun and filling food tour of cuisines from around the world.
text: William was a great guide who was very attentive and answered all our questions.  He tried to help in any way he could.  I highly recommend him.

reviews.title: A great experience!
text: Jessica was friendly and knowledgeable. She was able to get some picky eaters to try food that they never would have tried before - and they loved the food! We all thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. I highly recommend the tour with Jessica.

reviews.title: Overpriced tour but GREAT tour guide
text: I enjoyed the tour.  William, the guide, was excellent. He was polite, engaging and very excited to explain food fusion of the different cultures.  He was very professional.

However, I did feel like the experience was very overpriced in terms of the amount of food that I received.  The portions were VERY tiny, and the price was $94.00 for the tour!  Not even half a bagel or a half sandwich, one tiny dumpling.  In Toronto, for $94.00, a person could eat an entire meal at a great restaurant.  So other than being way overprice with small portions, it was a good experience.

reviews.title: Excellent, Interesting, tasty, and fun
text: The experience was very good. I tasted foods that I've never tasted before. Jusep was an excellent host and tour guide, very personal and knowledgeable about the history. I would recommend this tour to anyone interested in a fun experience.

reviews.title: Not just a foodie tour, but a full-fledged cultural experience
text: We have done food tours all over the world. I thought I knew what this tour would be like thinking that It would be a big market and they would take us to some of the more popular food stalls to try various items. This was anything, but that! This was truly a global cultural experience going to little off the beaten path restaurants that provided foods cooked with love and passion. By the end of the tour we had eaten foods from five continents.  We had food from Jamaica, Chile, Japan, Sweden, and even Tibet! What made this so special was Giuseppe‚Äòs (our guide and owner) knowledge of each place we visited. He has the heart and soul of Anthony Bourdain. This wasn‚Äôt just a food tour this was an experience that I will remember for the rest of my life.

reviews.title: Food tour
text: Jusep was absolutely INCREDIBLE. His knowledge of the food, the history, the food places, he was the best tour I have ever been on, food and otherwise.  All the food was incredible, you will not leave hungry!

reviews.title: 11/10 Amazing Tour!
text: I was lucky enough to experience this tour on a work outing and I immediately raved about it to my husband when I got home. I will definitely be going again just so he can experience it too and so I can get q second serving of all the food haha.

Our tour guide Jusep was INCREDIBLE! As a local taking the tour I would recommend it to ANYONE local or tourist because you will learn so much incredible history while exploring such a diverse range of delicious food.

reviews.title: Tour Guide was amazing
text: Jessica was so wonderful!  Very knowledgeable and made the tour very interesting. The food was amazing! Definitely will do it again.

reviews.title: Wonderful guide and tasting feast
text: Knowledgeable guide  about food and the market . A  wonderfull variety of food and the small group made it more enjoyable.

reviews.title: Wonderful thing to do in Toronto
text: Jusep was so knowledgeable and fun to hang with. Heartily recommend the tour and all the restaurants we went to. Everything was delicious, but come with an empty stomach. The portions are quite filling. Two thumbs way up!!

reviews.title: Great foodie tour
text: Great induction to the neighborhood. A good variety of food, Jusep gave great explanations about each taster we tried and their origins.  It was very relaxed no rushing, allowed us to stroll around the neighborhood and take it all in. We really enjoyed the tour.
